extensionDescription.message: A simple way to fill your attendance sheet at kenjo.io

fillAttendanceTodayTitle.description: Title for filling attendance for today

fillAttendanceWeekTitle.description: Title for filling attendance for the week

attendanceFilledTitle.description: Title if today has been filled

showMonthExplanation.message: This will show the button to fill the complete month. Use at your own risk!

showDayExplanation.message: This will show the button to fill a single day.

showWeekExplanation.message: This will show the button to fill the whole week.

entropyExplanation.message: This describes how much the start time will vary in minutes.

acknowledgment.message: Based on the Greasemonkey script by
